Data Structures
Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
 CMCSPI_Config_sMCSPI Global configuration
 CMCSPI_FxnTable_sThe definition of a MCSPI function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific MCSPI driver implementation
 CMCSPI_Params_sMCSPI Parameters
 CSPI_Config_sSPI Global configuration
 CSPI_FxnTable_sThe definition of a SPI function table that contains the required set of functions to control a specific SPI driver implementation
 CSPI_Params_sSPI Parameters
 CSPI_Transaction_sA SPI_Transaction data structure is used with SPI_transfer(). It indicates how many SPI_FrameFormat frames are sent and received from the buffers pointed to txBuf and rxBuf. The arg variable is an user-definable argument which gets passed to the SPI_CallbackFxn when the SPI driver is in SPI_MODE_CALLBACK
